articles.author: Ben Schoon
articles.title: How to buy an Android TV box without malware - 9to5Google
articles.description: You need to be careful if you buy an Android TV device, as while some can be safe, there are others packed with malware.
articles.content: “Android TV” has essentially two meanings on the market today. There’s the official Android TV OS by Google, which powers TV sets, streaming dongles, and set-top boxes, and then there’s Android, but … [+4458 chars]
